abstract: Longest bargaining session of NBA lockout ends without a deal and without much progress, but so far without 'enormous consequences' that commissioner David Stern threatened; NBA season opening night remains very much in jeopardy.
snippet: The parties will take a one-day break before reconvening on Monday, with opening night of the N.B.A. season very much in jeopardy.
lead_paragraph: The parties will take a one-day break before reconvening on Monday, with opening night of the N.B.A. season very much in jeopardy.

headline.main: Bargaining Session Is Greater in Length Than in Productivity
headline.print_headline: Bargaining Session Is Greater In Length Than in Productivity
headline.seo: N.B.A. Bargaining Session Is Long but Not Very Productive
